entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
